wikipedia_page.main: William Ian Brown (6 September 1910 – 15 January 1993), sometimes known as Billy Brown, was a professional footballer who played a number of positions in the Football League for Brentford, Luton Town, Leyton Orient and Huddersfield Town.

response: * Billy Brown (footballer, born 1910) (1910–1993), known as Buster Brown, English footballer for Luton Town, Huddersfied Town, Brentford and Leyton Orient
